turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to puchase a tall cafe Americano at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location do you want to get the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order the coffee at the nearest Midtown Tulsa location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your options are 1881 Yale Avenue or Utica Square.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get it at Utica Square.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When would you like to purchase the Americano?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get it in the next 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want it before 6:10 p.m.?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need any milk in the Americano?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I do not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need any sweetner in the Americano?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Regular sugar or cane sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cane sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The tall Care Americano with no milk, but regular sugar will be available at the Utica Square Starbucks at 6:30 p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank, I will pick it up soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, have a good day.
